name: Rebel! Pure love fighters!
description:
Free DLC installation method:
Run steam, after installing the game body, do not run the game, press the key combination "Win + R", enter: steam://install/1666900 in the pop-up window, and press Enter to automatically install the free DLC

Plot summary:

Gerard won the kendo tournament,
Appointed by the king to join the army to form a new knighthood,
He and his childhood sweetheart Madilia came to the barracks with dreams,
But got involved in a conspiracy...
In the process of resolving the crisis, the relationship with Delia has been cultivated.
I also met the caring knight Claire, lovely Nicole
More stories await your exploration

Character introduction:

Delia:

She looks cold on the outside, but she is actually a dedicated and gentle girl~

Claire:

A lovely female knight with a sense of justice~

Nicole:

The little pastor who doesn’t look strong has a tough heart

Game features:

  • Go on an adventure with the protagonist and gain love on the way.
  • Easy to use turn-based combat with rich strategies.
  • Various professions and unique skills, each profession has powerful nirvana.
  • The monsters who avoid by walking, choose to fight relatively freely.
